89  double frozenThermalConductivity() {

117  double heavyThermalConductivity();
118 
123  template <typename E>
124  double euken(const Eigen::ArrayBase<E>& cp)
125  {
126  const int ns = m_thermo.nGas(); assert(cp.size() == ns);
127  const int nh = m_thermo.nHeavy();
128  const int k = ns-nh;
129 
130  Eigen::Map<const Eigen::ArrayXd> X(m_thermo.X()+k, nh);
131  static Eigen::ArrayXd avDij; avDij.resize(nh);
132  const Eigen::ArrayXd& nDij = m_collisions.nDij();
133 
134  avDij.setZero();
135  for (int i = 0, index = 0; i < nh; ++i) {
136  // Account for diagonal term added twice
137  avDij(i) -= X(i)/nDij(index);
138  for (int j = i; j < nh; ++j, ++index) {
139  avDij(i) += X(j)/nDij(index);
140  avDij(j) += X(i)/nDij(index);
141  }
142  }
143 
144  return KB * (X * cp.tail(nh) / avDij).sum();
145  }
146

191 
196  void averageDiffusionCoeffs(double *const p_Di) {
197  Eigen::Map<Eigen::ArrayXd>(p_Di, m_thermo.nGas()) =
198  m_collisions.Dim();
199  }

417  double electronDiffusionCoefficient2(int order = 3)
418  {
419  const int nh = m_thermo.nHeavy();
420  return mp_esubsyst->electronDiffusionCoefficient2(
421  diffusionMatrix().bottomRightCorner(nh,nh), order);
422  }
423 
425  Eigen::Vector3d electronDiffusionCoefficient2B(int order = 3)
426  {
427  const int nh = m_thermo.nHeavy();
428  return mp_esubsyst->electronDiffusionCoefficient2B(
429  diffusionMatrix().bottomRightCorner(nh,nh), order);
430  }
